text: Blow is a live album by indie rocker Heather Nova, released in 1993. ==Track listing== All songs written by Heather Nova. #"Light Years" – 5:24 #"Sugar" – 6:48 #"Maybe an Angel" – 6:31 #"Blessed" – 2:37 #"Mothertongue" – 3:21 #"Talking to Strangers" – 5:05 #"Shaking the Doll" – 4:16 #"Frontier" – 5:17 #"Doubled Up" – 3:40 ==Personnel== *Heather Nova – guitar, vocals *David Ayers – guitar *Maz de Chastelaine – cello *Nadia Lanman – cello (1, 8 & 9) *Dean McCormick – drums (1, 8 & 9) *Cocoa Solid – bass *Richard Thair – drums ===Production=== *Felix Tod – producer *KK, Felix Tod – engineers *Caroline Smith – design *Heather Nova – illustrations *Kevin Westenberg – photography ==References== Category:Heather Nova albums Category:1993 live albums
title: Blow (Heather Nova album)
